welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tacloban, the charming city known for its warm hospitality and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Calle Zaragosa
restaurants.description: Calle Zaragosa is a gastropub located in Lungsod ng Tacloban.
restaurants.address: Independencia, 6500 Lungsod ng Tacloban, Tacloban City

restaurants.name: Giuseppe's Italian-Filipino Restaurant
restaurants.description: Giuseppe's Italian-Filipino Restaurant is a italian restaurant located in Leyte.
restaurants.address: 173 Avenida Veteranos (at MH Del Pilar St.), 6500 Tacloban City, Leyte

restaurants.name: Q Kitchen
restaurants.description: Q Kitchen is a asian restaurant located in Leyte.
restaurants.address: P. Zamora St (at MH Del Pilar St), 6500 Tacloban City, Leyte

restaurants.name: Ocho Seafood & Grill
restaurants.description: Ocho Seafood & Grill is a seafood restaurant located in Lungsod ng Tacloban.
restaurants.address: Sen Enage St (btwn Lopez Jaena St & T Claudio St), 6500 Lungsod ng Tacloban, Tacloban City

restaurants.name: Sunzibar
restaurants.description: Sunzibar is a mexican restaurant located in Leyte.
restaurants.address: P. Burgos St, 6500 Tacloban City, Leyte

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
